Weakness_Name: Account Management - Default accounts not disabled
Milestone_Description: Disable default accounts; review all service accounts; document exceptions with AO approval
Mitigation: Enumerate all accounts via PowerShell, disable non-essential accounts per STIG V-93369, document exceptions with AO approval in eMASS

Weakness_Name: Least Privilege - Users granted excessive administrative rights
Milestone_Description: Review all admin accounts; implement role-based access control; document residual risk
Mitigation: Implement RBAC using Active Directory groups; remove direct admin assignments; document residual exceptions with justification in POA&M

Weakness_Name: Session Lock - Screen lock not configured to 15-minute threshold
Milestone_Description: Configure Group Policy for 15-minute screen lock; test across all workstations
Mitigation: Deploy Group Policy Object to enforce 15-minute inactivity screen lock across all endpoints and validate compliance

Weakness_Name: Audit Events - Not all required events are being logged
Milestone_Description: Configure SIEM to capture all required NIST SP 800-92 events; validate log completeness
Mitigation: Update Windows audit policy via GPO; configure SIEM collection rules for all mandatory event categories; validate with test audit

Weakness_Name: Audit Record Generation - Audit content missing mandatory fields
Resources_Required: Security Engineer 12 hours; SIEM Administrator 8 hours
Milestone_Description: Update audit policies; validate mandatory fields present; configure SIEM dashboards for monitoring
Mitigation: Reconfigure Windows Advanced Audit Policy to include user ID, timestamp, event type, success/failure indicator, and resource accessed fields

Weakness_Name: Plan of Action - POA&M tracking system not integrated with eMASS
Mitigation: Integrate POA&M tracking with eMASS system to automate status updates and reporting to AO

Weakness_Name: Configuration Settings - STIG-required settings not applied to all endpoints
Milestone_Description: Apply STIG baseline GPO; audit deviations; document exceptions with justification
Mitigation: Deploy Windows Server 2019 STIG baseline via Group Policy; document all approved deviations in eMASS with AO acceptance

Weakness_Name: Least Functionality - Unauthorized services running on production systems
Milestone_Description: Audit running services; disable unauthorized services; document required services with business justification

Weakness_Name: User-Installed Software - Unauthorized software detected on endpoints
Milestone_Description: Implement software whitelisting; remove unauthorized software; configure AppLocker policies
Mitigation: Deployed AppLocker policy to enforce software whitelist; removed 12 unauthorized applications; documented approved exceptions in eMASS with dates, rationale, and AO sign-off

Weakness_Name: Authenticator Management - Passwords do not meet complexity requirements
Milestone_Description: Update password policy; enforce via AD Group Policy; notify users of change

Weakness_Name: Vulnerability Scanning - Scanning not performed on required quarterly schedule
Resources_Required: Security Engineer 32 hours; Vulnerability Scanner License
Milestone_Description: Configure automated scanning; establish scanning schedule; integrate scan results with eMASS
Mitigation: Configure Tenable Nessus for automated quarterly scanning; integrate scan results with eMASS via API; establish and publish scanning SOP with roles and responsibilities

Weakness_Name: Transmission Confidentiality - Unencrypted protocols in use on management interfaces
Milestone_Description: Disable Telnet and FTP; enable SSH and SFTP; validate with network scan
Mitigation: Replace Telnet with SSH 2.0 and FTP with SFTP on all management interfaces; disable legacy protocols via ACL and firewall rules

Weakness_Name: Protection of Information at Rest - Database encryption not enabled on production databases
Milestone_Description: Enable Transparent Data Encryption; test performance impact; document configuration changes

Weakness_Name: Flaw Remediation - Critical patches not applied within 30-day SLA on 14 systems
Milestone_Description: Apply outstanding patches; validate with scanner; document exceptions with AO approval

Weakness_Name: Malicious Code Protection - Antivirus definitions not current on all endpoints
Resources_Required: System Administrator 8 hours; Endpoint Security Administrator 4 hours
Milestone_Description: Update AV definitions; configure automatic updates; validate coverage across all endpoints
Mitigation: Configure Windows Defender to automatically update virus definitions every 4 hours; validate update delivery via WSUS; document endpoints with exceptions and remediation timeline
